TopicTitle: What are the parameters to a kerbostationary orbit?

Articles.Content: Some one please give me to parameters to a kerbostationary orbit (ie. SMA= ECC= INC= LPE= LAN= MNA= EPH= REF= OBL=) Please help! ??? :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :sos: :hailprobe: :probe: :probe: :hailprobe:
Thanks alot! but now where do i put these things :sos:
